DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study see brief delay cord clamp 30 45 second would result high hematocrit level , few transfusion , healthy lung , good motor function 40 wks 7 month age .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Delayed Cord Clamping Very Low Birth Weight Infants
DOC.detailed_description: When cord clamp delay birth cord milk , infant receive placental transfusion 10-15 mL/kg first minute life . This additional blood improves hemodynamic stability may reduce risk intraventricular hemorrhage ( IVH ) vulnerability infant inflammatory process . This blood also contain stem cell important repair tissue building immunocompetence . The current randomized control trial prospectively test effect DCC 30-45 second follow 1 cord milk aim confirm prior work provide long-term follow-up . Our priori hypothesis DCC would reduce incidence IVH , LOS , result well motor function 18-22 month .
DOC.criteria: Women pregnant gestation 24 31.6 week singleton pregnancy obstetrical evaluation Obstetrician 's approval enrollment study Parental consent Any mode birth include Obstetrician 's refusal enroll infant Parental refusal consent Prenatallydiagnosed major congenital anomaly [ multiple gestation ] Intent withhold withdraw care Severe multiple maternal illness , frank vaginal bleeding , placenta abruption previa Mothers institutionalize psychotic
